snippet: The Chinese Communist Party opened a weeklong conference on Nov. 6 to present the next generation of national leaders.  A selection of op-ed articles and editorials from 1945 onward suggest the problems and challenges they face.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese Communist Party opened a weeklong conference on Nov. 6 to present the next generation of national leaders.  A selection of op-ed articles and editorials from 1945 onward suggest the problems and challenges they face.
